channel.title: Everyone good at servers please read
channel.description:
ok i need help with two things
1. a kickbut server that works i cant get anyone to work
2. and help on starting your server after you have extracted and changed em and all that what do you do to get your server up and running so you can actually get on it

item.title: Everyone good at servers please read
item.dc:creator: @javis javis
item.description:
@javis wrote:

hmm
when i used phone scape i think the code was like
@echo off
title Runserver
set java=“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe”
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause
just go and click edit on runeserver (note make copy of stuff in there) and put that code above in there

item.title: Everyone good at servers please read
item.dc:creator: @javis javis
item.description:
@javis wrote:

k go to downloads and download lets say phonescape (good source). Once youve downloaded extract and such. Edit w/e you want in client.java ect. The click on the runserver.bat and open it. now server will be up and running. open your moparscape and play. Note if you want other ppl to play folow this its a guide I made on my website

I decided to make this little guid based off what I had to do to get server up and running. Hope u all enjoy.

K first off go download winrar. I recomend going on google.com and and searching for free winrar lol. NOTE (winrar is what makes it so u can actually download sources exc.)

K second off u need to get a server source. Download and save it to your documents. I recomend Testscape for new coders and PVP scape or Pimpscape for advanced. NOTE; i will not be releasing my source ;p.

Now once uve done all of that u should see a pile off books in your documents that says eather Testscape or w/e source u downloaded. Right click those and then click extract and then ok. No u should have a folder with the same name as the books. Open it and find Client.java. Right click Client.java and click open with and use notepad. Now u may start editing stuff. I recomend asking in tut forum for help with added stuff.

Now Go to no-ip.com and register. Once ur done log on and look at the left of the screen for somthing that says host/redirects and clickHos add. Click it and where it says Hostname and change to what u want ur no-ip to be. then under that u can click the drop down thing and pic if u want no-ip.info, no-ip.org, no-ip.biz, ect. Now dont touch anything else just scroll down to where it says creat host and click that. No u have a proper host

K for the part where u make it so every one else can get on. Click downloads at top of screen on no-ip.com and choose what type of software u have(weather it be mac, windows, lunix, ect.) and download it to ur desktop. Open it and do all the stuff it says. Then when u get the pop up with ur server ip in it check the box beside ur servers ip. NOTE (There will only be one thing in there). Once uve click and u should hav server ready to go online.

Now go into ur documents and open ur server again. Now open Runeserver.bat. And there u go just log on now.

:Pics:
Adding host

Naming server ip

Downloading no-ip

and whala lol hope this helps

Read full topic
